```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)



# Read and filter bibliography
bib <- ReadBib("scholar.bib")

articles <- subset(bib, grepl("article", bib$keywords, ignore.case = TRUE))
proceedings <- subset(bib, grepl("proceeding", bib$keywords, ignore.case = TRUE))
preprints <- subset(bib, grepl("preprint", bib$keywords, ignore.case = TRUE))
conference <- subset(bib, grepl("conference", bib$keywords, ignore.case = TRUE))
# Clean formatter using RefManageR built-in function
print_citations <- function(entries) {
  if (length(entries) == 0) {
    cat("No publications found.\n")
  } else {
    Cite(entries, .bibstyle = "numeric", .cite.style = "none")
    PrintBibliography(entries)
  }
}


```


## Peer-Reviewed Articles

```{r echo=FALSE}
print_citations(articles)

```

## Pre-prints

```{r echo=FALSE}
print_citations(preprints)

```

## Conference Paper
```{r echo=FALSE}
print_citations(conference)

```

## Conference Proceedings (Oral/Poster)
```{r echo=FALSE}
print_citations(proceedings)

```
